title: So Now Cortana’s Files Are Blocking Windows Restore in Windows 10
text: Cortana is one of the key features that Microsoft introduced in Windows 10, but contrary to what many people and the company itself expected, the personal assistant isn’t working really smoothly and in several cases, it causes issues that are basically ruining the experience with the new OS. It’s no secret that some »
